title: Agentic AI Resume using NLP
features: Designed and implemented a transformer‑based NLP pipeline that generates personalized resumes, reducing content creation time by 70% and achieving a 95% user satisfaction rate
Architected a microservices architecture using Flask and Docker, integrating GPT‑powered agents with a PostgreSQL backend to ensure scalable, real‑time resume generation
Optimized prompt engineering and token usage, cutting inference cost by 35% while maintaining high semantic relevance across diverse industry domains
